attributes.action: Showers in all Social Housing (Council Houses)
attributes.additional_details:
I am creating this petition for the government to make recommendations that all social housing landlords have an obligation for sanitary reasons to install  a shower into bathrooms for all tenants.
I find it very hard to believe that in the year 2014 there is still social housing without a basic shower.

Not every tenant is in reciept o housing benefit and most do actually pay a fair rent, I believe everybody should be entitled to have the choice of a shower.

I rent privately and would not even take a tenancy on without a shower being in the premises. For those interested I am doing this for my sister who is a social housing tenant and has been told very clealy her housing association will not pay to have showers installed.

Please sign this petition and keep forwarding link.
